# Data import in R

The most basic task that a software has during data analyses is to import data. This chapter shows you how to import data into R with a variety of approaches. We will 
be partial to tidyverse-compliant methods, but will introduce other methods that are useful for either specialization or speed. 

## Reading data into R with `readr`

The basic workhorse in the tidyverse for importing data is the [`readr`](https://cran.r-project.org?package=readr){target="_blank"} package
